io.simplesource.saga.model.action

  • Classes in io.simplesource.saga.model.action used by io.simplesource.saga.action.async 
    Class and Description
    UndoCommand
    Represents an undo action returned in the action response to dynamically set the undo (compensation) command for the action for if the saga later fails.
  • Classes in io.simplesource.saga.model.action used by io.simplesource.saga.action.http 
    Class and Description
    UndoCommand
    Represents an undo action returned in the action response to dynamically set the undo (compensation) command for the action for if the saga later fails.
  • Classes in io.simplesource.saga.model.action used by io.simplesource.saga.client.dsl 
    Class and Description
    ActionId
    An ActionId uniquely identifies an action in the saga dependency graph.
  • Classes in io.simplesource.saga.model.action used by io.simplesource.saga.model.action 
    Class and Description
    ActionCommand
    An ActionCommand is a data class with the information needed: to uniquely identify the execution of the action and know whether it has been processed or not. to determine which action processor to use to process an action. by the action processor to process the action.
    ActionId
    An ActionId uniquely identifies an action in the saga dependency graph.
    ActionStatus
    An enum representing the current state of an action within a saga
    SagaAction
    The representation of an action within a Saga
  • Classes in io.simplesource.saga.model.action used by io.simplesource.saga.model.messages 
    Class and Description
    ActionCommand
    An ActionCommand is a data class with the information needed: to uniquely identify the execution of the action and know whether it has been processed or not. to determine which action processor to use to process an action. by the action processor to process the action.
    ActionId
    An ActionId uniquely identifies an action in the saga dependency graph.
    ActionStatus
    An enum representing the current state of an action within a saga
    UndoCommand
    Represents an undo action returned in the action response to dynamically set the undo (compensation) command for the action for if the saga later fails.
